response.original_title: Knockout: The Untold Story of Royce Claxton
response.overview: The story of the trials and tribulations of New York native Royce Claxton who's named as the most ruthless boxer on the planet faces his past as he fights through his toughest inner demons. Unprivileged, harded by pain and loss, Royce using boxing as his way out but on his way through a victorious career, he runs into many surprises about his past, family, and his true identity.
response.tagline: Sometimes your toughest opponent is yourself!
response.title: Knockout: The Untold Story of Royce Claxton
